Request VRF Verify VRF

A transparent pipeline for generating and verifying randomness — all handled through a distributed network of specialized nodes.

SPHERE VRF Workflow Overview

🎯 Client ➜ Requests a random number
🧠 System Node ➜ Receives & validates request
👑 Master Node ➜ Distributes workload to a Manager
🧰 Manager Nodes ➜ Assign tasks to Worker Nodes
⚙️ Worker Nodes ➜ Generate VRF proofs from request
🔍 Verifier Node ➜ Confirms proof authenticity
👑 Master Node ➜ Assembles verified result
🧠 System Node ➜ Returns the final result to client
🔍 Verifier Node ➜ Continuously monitors and verifies
🎯 Client (optional) ➜ Independently verifies result

Real hardware. Real randomness. Real trust.
